segments.text: How often do you have English lessons ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a lesson once a week but I try to practice every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I usually look at English language websites every day and go to my local English Corner twice a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you ever speak to native speakers of English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sadly , I hardly ever speak to English people . I usually practice with my Chinese friends .
segments.speaker: S2
